name: 60s To Die !
description:
60s to die is a game about a square that used to live in a time that a new virus called Blockied 19 spreaded in the world, & our squary friend only have 60s to collect all the parts in him to get stronger & stand againest Blockied 19 !

if you have any issues then try the low end version, not a noiticible different, & runs faster ! 

Note : a small bug fixing update has been release
